MenuOption

SelectButtons

components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-template #content><ng-content></ng-content></ng-template>

<button *ngIf="sty === 'text'" mat-button [color]="color" ngClass={{getClass()}} [disabled]="disabled" (click)="onClickButton($event)">
    <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="content"></ng-container>
</button>

<button *ngIf="sty === 'outlined'" mat-stroked-button [color]="color" ngClass={{getClass()}} [disabled]="disabled" (click)="onClickButton($event)">
    <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="content"></ng-container>
</button>

<button *ngIf="sty === 'raised'" mat-raised-button [color]="color" ngClass={{getClass()}} [disabled]="disabled" (click)="onClickButton($event)">
    <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="content"></ng-container>
</button>

<button *ngIf="sty === 'flat'" mat-flat-button [color]="color" ngClass={{getClass()}} [disabled]="disabled" (click)="onClickButton($event)">
    <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="content"></ng-container>
</button>

components.name: ChipsComponent

inputsClass.name: moreOption
inputsClass.rawdescription: More Option. When the menu has several items, it's replaced for the item moreOption.

components.name: SearchComponent
components.templateData: {{ label}} search {{ option.item.description }} - {{ option.item.code }}

components.name: SelectComponent
components.templateData: {{ label }} {{selected ? selected[0]?.viewValue : ''}} (+{{selected.length - 1}} {{selected?.length === 2 ? otherText.text1: otherText.text2}}) {{option.viewValue}} {{option.viewValue}}
